text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Northern Red Sea Zone | native_name = Zoba Semienawi Keyih Bahri ዞባ ሰሜናዊ ቀይሕ ባሕሪ | native_name_lang = | other_name = Regione del Mar Rosso Settentrionale | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = Massawa harbour.JPG | image_alt = | image_cai = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | mottoeng = | image_map = Northern Red Sea in Eritrea.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Northern Red Sea Region in Eritrea | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | parts_type = | parts_style = | parts = | p1 = | p2 = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Massawa | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = Administrator | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 27,800 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 897,454 | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = ER-SK | website = | footnotes = }} The Northern Red Sea Region is a region in Eritrea. The capital city is Massawa. It is along the northern three quarters of the Red Sea, and includes the Dahlak Archipelago. The lowest point in Eritrea, Lake Kulul, is in this region. The region also includes the following subregions: * Afabet Subregion * Dahlak Subregion * Ghelalo Subregion * Foro Subregion * Ghinda Subregion * Karura Subregion * Massawa Subregion * Nakfa Subregion * She'eb Subregion Category:Regions of Eritrea Category:1996 establishments in Eritrea
title: Northern Red Sea Region
